songs.title: Power & Control (Demo Version 1)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Power and control

[Verse 1]
Give a little, get a lot
That’s just how you are with love
Give a little, get a lot
Yeah, you may be good looking
But you’re not a piece of art

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall

[Post-Chorus 1]
Come the snow and come the rain
I lost my self-control again
I let you take my breath away
I played your stupid little game

[Verse 2]
Think you’re funny, think you’re smart
Think you’re gonna break my heart
Think you’re funny, think you’re smart
Yeah, you may be good looking
But you’re not a piece of art

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gonna make you fall

[Post-Chorus 2]
Come the snow and come the rain
I lost my self-control again
I let you take my breath away
I played your stupid little game

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna make you fall
I’m gunna take your self control
I’m gunna make you fall
Because you’re making me feel small

[Interlude]
Today, today, but not today
Not today, today, day
Day, day, day

[Chorus]
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
Power and control
Cause underneath it all

[Outro]
When you’re around I feel so small
When you’re around I feel so small
Power and control
I’m gunna make you fall
Fall, fall, fall, fall, fall
